mapper.select: select url from privilege inner join (select privilege_id as privilegeId from role_privilege as roleprivilege inner join (select role_id as roleId from role_manager as rolemanager where manager_id=#{userId}) as rid on(rid.roleId=roleprivilege.role_id)) as pid on (pid.privilegeId=privilege.id)

SELECT id,NAME,url,backurl AS backUrl,parentId,(SELECT NAME FROM menu WHERE id= parentId) AS parentName FROM menu WHERE EXISTS( SELECT menu_id FROM role_menu WHERE EXISTS (SELECT role_id FROM role_manager WHERE manager_id = #{userId} AND role_manager.`role_id` = role_menu.role_id) AND role_menu.`menu_id` = menu.`id` )

select ulog.url,privilege.description,ulog.id as logId,ulog.manager_id as managerId ,ulog.createtime as createTime,ulog.ip,manager.name as managerName from privilege inner join (manager, (select log.id ,manager_id ,ip, createtime ,url from log
) as ulog) on (privilege.url=ulog.url and manager.id=ulog.manager_id)

SELECT l.id,l.manager_id managerId,l.ip,l.url,pl.description content,l.createtime,m.name managerName FROM LOG l LEFT JOIN manager m ON( l.manager_id=m.id) LEFT JOIN privilege pl ON(pl.url=l.url) where 1=1
and m.name like concat("%",#{managerName},"%")
and l.ip like concat("%",#{ip},"%")
order by l.createtime desc
